languages.text: Нужно отпереть дверь в нижней части отсека — рядом должно быть устройство, что откроет путь.
The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.
languages.original_text: Нужно отпереть дверь в нижней части отсека — рядом должно быть устройство, что откроет путь.

traits.locale_text: You must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、ベイの下部にある扉のロックを解除しなければならない。道を開くための装置が近くにあるはずだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、ベイの下部にある扉のロックを解除しなければならない。道を開くための装置が近くにあるはずだ。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain muss die Tür im unteren Teil der Bucht aufsperren. Ein Gerät, das den Weg öffnet, müsste sich in der Nähe befinden.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain muss die Tür im unteren Teil der Bucht aufsperren. Ein Gerät, das den Weg öffnet, müsste sich in der Nähe befinden.

languages.text: {rt_mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit déverrouiller la porte dans les bas-fonds de la baie. Un appareil permettant d'ouvrir la voie doit se trouver à proximité.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit déverrouiller la porte dans les bas-fonds de la baie. Un appareil permettant d'ouvrir la voie doit se trouver à proximité.

languages.text: {rt_mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe abrir la puerta que hay en la parte inferior del compartimento. Cerca de aquí debería haber un dispositivo que despeje el camino.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe abrir la puerta que hay en la parte inferior del compartimento. Cerca de aquí debería haber un dispositivo que despeje el camino.

languages.text: 行商浪人必须打开底层甲板的大门，这附近应该有清理通道的装置。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人必须打开底层甲板的大门，这附近应该有清理通道的装置。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın bölmenin aşağısındaki kapıyı açması gerekiyor. Yakınlarında yolu açacak bir şey olmalı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain must unlock the door in the bottom part of the bay. A device that will open the path should be nearby.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın bölmenin aşağısındaki kapıyı açması gerekmektedir. Yakınlarında yolu açacak bir cihaz olmalı.
